title: Provisional AFK's
body: I was wondering if provisionals count if you have an AFK  or two because I personally think they shouldn't count if they have been AFK for the whole game. I get hate comments on all of the threads I post so please don't get mad at me, thanks.

replies.body: Yeah provisional AFK's suck, But trust me, it's so much better to be in a lower elo than you should be than a higher elo than you should be. You might even learn to hard carry games as you climb.

They do count but I should let you know the AFK loses two games instead of the one game you get. I know this for a fact because I lost two games for one ark of mine. Which I'm quite annoyed about because for one thing I hadn' t lost a provisional yet, we were winning and I was deathless and then had a black out. Couldn't get back on League for a day. Then found out I had lost two provisionals for the one. Shame.
